title: Purple Haze
bio: Grow outside with healthy soil, or grow hydroponically. Prune and top the plant to keep a uniform and bushy shape while making sure to support the colas as they develop. The strain does not always produce purple buds,but you can lower the temperature of your grow room or grow outside to coerce purple hues.
